data.title: Pan Pacific Vancouver - Vancouver, BC Meeting Venues and Event Space
data.meta_description: The award winning Pan Pacific Vancouver occupies a privileged position atop the Vancouver Convention Centre with breathtaking waterfront views. With 42,000 sq. ft. of naturally lit event space, we set the stage for extraordinary experiences.
data.text:
More

The Pan Pacific Vancouver is an unparalleled downtown luxury hotel with sweeping views of the North Shore Mountains, Coal Harbour, Stanley Park and Vancouverâs city skyline. The hotel occupies a privileged position in the Canada Place complex located on top of the Vancouver Convention Centre East building and connected by underground walkway to the West building. This iconic architectural & historical landmark is also home to Vancouverâs Cruise Ship Terminal. The Pan Pacific is Vancouverâs most recognized hotel. Our central waterfront location is within walking distance to historic Gastown, cosmopolitan restaurants, world-class shopping, outdoor activities and many of the cityâs top tourist attractions. The hotel is a 23 minute âdoor to doorâ commute from Vancouver International Airport via taxi, or attendees can utilize the Canada Line light rail transit system which runs to Waterfront Station, just steps from our front door. Our function space offers you a choice of conference facilities & meeting rooms with breathtaking ocean or city skyline views, unique to Vancouver.
